This personal vehicle can fly, and its distance becomes Ã—3.

While you are driving this personal vehicle, your melee attacks can target flying creatures, and none of the creatures inside the personal vehicle can be targeted by melee attacks unless the attacker is flying or is somehow able to reach flying targets.

These benefits do not apply while the personal vehicle is inactive or grounded, while you are in Crisis, or while you are covering another creature with the Guard action. Additionally, if a creature aboard this personal vehicle suffers air, bolt or ice damage during a conflict, the benefits of this module cease until the start of your next turn.
